34: Iridium ore fired from this are given cosmic energy

Entries.AndyStrawberrySeeds: Heya @,^^Here's three bags of strawberry seeds. These ought to help you durin' your first season in the valley. Farmers gotta stick together these days.^^ -Andy %item object 745 3 %%
Entries.GuntherGift: Dear @,^^Enclosed is a portion of the funding we were recently awarded by the Regional Secretary of Artifacts. Thanks to your generous donations, the museum has become a major contributor to ongoing efforts to conserve Ferngill's cultural heritage. I hope these funds provide assistance in your future adventures.^^ -Gunther %item money 40000 40001 %%
Entries.AndyJojaCola: Heya @,^^I got lucky in a raffle and landed myself a lifetime supply of Joja cola! These'll help keep your energy up while you're working on the farm.^^  -Andy %item object 167 50 %%
Entries.AndyAncientSeeds: @,^Found these while I was foraging deep in the forest. Not exactly sure what they are, but I reckon you're better equipped to cultivate them than me. Lemme know what pops up if you get em growing.^^  -Andy %item object 114 5 %%
Entries.SusanIntroduction: Hello, @^^My name is Susan. Lewis told me you're a new farmer in town. I'm trapped on my farm in the mountains so I can't say hi in person! Hopefully the mess Joja made will be cleared out soon, because I'm going a little stir crazy. Can't wait to meet you and see how the farm is shaping up!^^  -Susan
Entries.SusanFertilizer: Hello @!,^^This is some of the best fertilizer I've made. Grow something delicious and share it with me!^^  -Susan %item object 369 20 %%
Entries.SusanMelonSeeds: @!^^My melons are growing like wildfire this year! Here's some extra seeds I got when I popped a number of them in my seedmaker. Don't go trying to compete with me for the melon market though... I'll win!^^  -Susan %item object 479 5 %%
Entries.VictorDewey: Dear @,^^I'm writing to thank you for listening to me in the graveyard. I know conversations like that can be stressful. If Dewey ever returns, I know he'll be just as happy to have you for a friend as I am.^^  Sincerely, Victor
Entries.OliviaWine: Dear @,^^The market went my way and I cashed out some of my shares for a huge windfall! To celebrate, I ordered a case of my favorite wine, and I wanted to share a few bottles with you. Let's have a glass together soon!^^  -Olivia %item object 348 5 %%
Entries.OliviaCellar: Dear @,^^I wanted to thank you for being such a sweetheart and listening to me the other day. I know I can get a little maudlin when I've had a few glasses. Next time we have a drink, I'll tell you about some of the marvelous places I've visited. It's easy to forget there's a world outside of the valley sometimes, but I have plenty of stories to share.^^  All my love, Olivia
Entries.AbigailJunimo: Hi @,^^I'm still processing what we talked about the other day. I've got more questions than answers. I can't believe that I'm not the only one. I know you won't, but please don't mention this to anyone. I think that this secret just has more secrets underneath it, and I'm not sure I'm ready to turn over all the rocks in my life. Let's talk more soon.^^  -Abby
Entries.GusSophia: Hi @,^^Just wanted to drop you a quick line to ask you not to mention what I told you to Sophia. I trust you to be discreet. It's important we're on the same page. Looking forward to seeing you at the saloon soon.^^  -Gus
Entries.HaleyTalk: @,^^Thanks for being kind the other day. I was totally freaking out and you were super patient. I talked to Emily and she's being super helpful and understanding too. I know I can be a  real brat sometimes. We should talk again soon.^^  -Haley
Entries.KentSummit: Hey @,^^Sorry again for getting so worked up the other day. I wanted to let you know I've started talking to a professional about this. Ever since I came back, I never know what'll set me off. It's time I get my life in order.^^  -Kent
Entries.PierreSVERebate: @,^^Thanks to you and the quality produce you've been shipping, my store's business is booming. Along with our regular rebates, I wanted to send you a special bonus. Thanks for being such a good customer and contributor to our small community. It's people like you who keep local businesses alive.^^  -Pierre %item money 2000 5001 %%
Entries.JojaRockslideNotice: To our valued JojaMart customers:^^Please be advised that the landslide blockage near the railroad will be cleared using explosives tomorrow morning. Avoid the area in case of falling rocks. Joja Co. is not responsible for any damage incurred to people or property in the vicinity.^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement1: Dear resident:^^Our records indicate that you may not have a membership at JojaMart. Did you know that Joja has consistently scored top in the industry for quality and value? A membership may seem like a big investment, but it unlocks so much - it's a real lifechanger! Join today, and become part of the Joja family.^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement2: Dear resident:^^In our time in STARDEW VALLEY, Joja has made an effort to become a contributing member of the community. But we can't do it without your help! If you choose to shop at Joja competitors such as PIERRE'S GENERAL STORE, you won't have the same assurance of quality and consistency. And without your business, we won't be able to afford to contribute as much as we'd like to local charities.^^^^Shop at JojaMart and help keep your community great!^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement3: Is work stressing you out? Why not take a trip to the Fern Islands? The Islands are a bustling center of commerce, famous for ring fruit! Even those on a tight budget will find plenty to enjoy! From the sparkling-clean beaches to lush tropical forests, the Fern Islands are a natural oasis that appeals to beachgoers, birdwatchers, and appreciators of nature from all walks of life. Come chase your bliss on the Fern Islands!^^This advertisement paid for by the Fern Islands Bureau of Tourism.
Entries.SVEadvertisement4: Getting sick of watering crops? Upgraded tools still not doing the job? Running a farm is hard work. Consider hiring some farmhands to help! Especially in high-output seasons like the fall, having a few spare folks around can be invaluable for saving time. Plus, you help create jobs for your local community. Check your local bulletin board to see if anyone's looking for work!
Entries.SVEadvertisement5: ON SALE FOR A LIMITED TIME:^^Special yeast starter with nutrients designed to optimize wine fermentation from a quality-controlled yeast ranch. Has produced award-winning wine consistently since the strain was started almost twenty years ago. Inquiries welcome at Sunshine Vineyard.
Entries.SVEadvertisement6: Are you homebrewing beer? Fermenting your own grapes? Sick of your pricy liquids leaking or drying up in low-quality storage? Try hardwood barrels! They don't leak, they naturally repel liquids, and they're almost completely immune to temperature changes, so no more nasty cracks. Craft them yourself, or stop by Grampleton and pick some up from one of our many talented artisans!
Entries.robinKitchenLetter: Dear Farmer @,^^You might need some more space someday! That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house. The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^   Your local carpenter,^   Robin
Entries.JasThankYouLetter: To Farmer @,^^Aunt Marnie said I needed to write a thank you letter. So... thanks for finding me in the forest and taking me back home. I won't go that far in the forest again.^^  -Jas
Entries.winter_7: Dear @,^^Tomorrow we're all gathering by Andy's house and walking to the fishing spot in the forest for the Festival of Ice.^^It's a celebration of winter... there'll be snowmen, ice sculptures, and an ice fishing competition!^Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor Lewis
Entries.OliviaDatingLetter: Dear @,^^I've been having feelings about our relationship we just started. I need to tell you some things. Can you visit me at my residence when you have a chance?^^  -Olivia
Entries.OliviaPartyLetter: Hi honey,^^I'm throwing a house party tonight at my residence. Most of the townsfolk will be there, along with my special guest: the governor!! I would absolutely love you to come, @. The party starts at 6:00PM. Don't be late!^^  -Your love, Olivia
Entries.MarlonLetterCherryBomb: @,^^The mines are dangerous. These cherry bombs will help during your expeditions.^^Be careful.^^   -Marlon %item object 286 5 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterCherryBombX: @,^^We received an extra shipment of supplies from Castle Village. I believe you can make good use of these. Good luck.^^  -Marlon %item object 286 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterBomb: @,^^Your assistance in monster eradication has been most helpful to our efforts in protecting the valley. These bombs will help you on your adventures. Stay safe.^^  -Marlon %item object 287 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterMegaBomb: @,^^The guild received another shipment of weapons from Castle Village. These bombs pack a punch. Don't stand too close to them once ignited.^^  -Marlon %item object 288 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterPotions: @,^^Camilla, the witch of Castle Village, supplied 30 elixers to the guild. This is one of her finest brews yet. I'm mailing you half of them. These will assist in your expeditions. Good luck.^^  -Marlon %item object 773 15 %%
Entries.ShrineOfIllusionsLetter: Greetings @,^^You've proven your trustworthiness. I would like to propose I teach you some basic magic. Visit me in my chambers at your earliest convenience.^^   -M. Rasmodius
Entries.AndyPictureLetter: Hey farmer,^^Found something in the midst of organizin' my house. Drop on by and I'll show ya! I think you'll enjoy it.^^   -Andy
Entries.SophiaThankYouLetter: Hey you,^^Thanks for helping me restore my parents' room. I couldn't have done it without you, especially with the heavy stuff! I know it's strange I packed everything up and moved it all back... I suppose it was a change of heart.^Enclosed is a bottle of my finest aged Blue Moon wine. Thanks, silly!^^  -Sophia %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Aged Blue Moon Wine}} 1 %%

Entries.PurchasedItem_Teen: Hey, so I picked up a {2} at the store last night. Pierre said it came from %farm Farm!$1

Entries.SoundInTheNight_Earthquake: There was an explosion during the night...

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Victor: Ah, of course! I'd love to see a movie with you!$3#$e#Shall we walk to the movie theater together?$1
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Olivia: Oh, you want to see a film at the cinema? It'll be a lovely date night.$3
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Sophia: Oooh! A movie? Yay!$9#$b#I'll meet you there okay?$1#$e#I'm going to get cotton candy!$1

Entries.Pierre: Happy Spirits' Eve, @!$h#$b#The wizard who lives in the woods created this maze. Apparently, there are two treasure chests hidden in there!$0#$e#But to find the treasure you need to get past the creatures he summoned to guard it... So that'll be a no from me.$s#$b#Best of luck to you if you attempt to find the treasure, @!$h
Entries.Wizard: Hello, @. Have you entered the maze? I deployed... surprises for anyone who dares enter.#0#$e#I might have gone a little overboard with the monsters!$h
Entries.Linus: Hi, @. I hope this evening is treating you well.$0#$b#Many shadow brutes are violent, but these ones are particularly aggressive. If given the opportunity, they would tear you limb from limb!$3#$e#Not all shadow people are violent, though.$0#$b#I'm good friends with one called 'Krobus'. I understand what it's like to be judged for being different.$h#$e#Enjoy the festival.$1
Entries.Krobus: My friends... trapped in those cages...#$e#What will happen to them after the festival...?$2
Entries.Dwarf: Curious, I am...#$e#Did you climb up here to greet me?

Entries.Victor0: I'm a little nervous about this? Aren't you?$4
Entries.Victor1: To think I couldn't be anymore happier...$4

BeforeMovie.Text: I love sci-fi films!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Let's see another movie sometime.$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Horror movie, huh? I might end up holding your hand.$2

AfterMovie.Text: My heart is beating fast after that thriller.$7

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah. This should be quite an interesting film.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Really puts the world in perspective. Do you think we'll ever visit the stars someday?$1

BeforeMovie.Text: You know, I never did beat this game. I'll watch it, though!$1

AfterMovie.Text: That was great. I want to play the game now!$3

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm looking forward to this movie.$1

AfterMovie.Text: This was a wonderful idea. Which part of the movie was your favorite?$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Hey. Thanks for inviting me.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Must say, I did enjoy myself. I appreciate you taking me out, @.$3

BeforeMovie.Text: At least the seats are comfy...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Err. The acting wasn't the best. I expected a bit more.$2

Entries.Victor: I think Abigail is going to stomp everyone again. She always does.$0#$e#Mayor Lewis should consider asking her not to participate. It isn't fair for Vincent and Jas.$6#$e#Really, the same could be said about you too, @.$0
Hey, honey! Good luck hunting eggs today. Show those children who's boss.$1
This strawberry jello is truly remarkable.$3
I always do enjoy our little trips out into the forest.$1#$b#Kinda wish we did this more often with everyone.$3
My mother and I just threw in some of our most expensive wine. It should make the soup taste delicious.$1#$e#I don't think any of the children can have any now though. Whoops.$2
We should sit next to each other and eat our soup!$4#$e#We can drink a glass of my mother's vintage wine with it!$1
These moonlight jellies travel here all the way from across the world.$3#$b#They were at the Fern Islands just a few months ago.$1
I'd like to hold your hand while looking out at the moonlight jellies.$4#$e#I love you, @.$4
That clown is only juggling one ball... How odd.$0#$e#I might go look at the grange displays soon. This is getting boring.$2#$e#Have you set your display up?$1
Hey there, honey! I hope you do well in the grange display contest!$4
Uhh... there's a skeleton monster patrolling in there by those graves.$2
Be careful in there, honey! There's a monster!$7
I must say, I'm looking forward to seeing Willy show off his fishing skills.$1#$b#You can tell how talented he is. He's been fishing all of his life!$3
Good luck in the fishing contest, sweetheart. You're going to do great!$4#$e#I'll be cheering for you!$1
I wonder if I should give her the gift now? Hmm. Timing is everything.$0
Hey, @. Umm... I have a gift for you at home.$4#$b#I'll show you tonight, okay?$4

Entries.2000000/f Victor 500/e 1000034/p Victor: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer 20 34 0 Victor 24 25 2/pause 400/skippable/showFrame Victor 37/viewport 22 27 true/move farmer 0 -7 1/pause 800/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 38/pause 650/speak Victor "Oh, sorry. I didn't see you there, @!$1"/pause 300/showFrame Victor 37/pause 600/showFrame Victor 38/pause 300/speak Victor "I'm in the middle of reading an adventurer's book about the Fern Islands archipelago. You may not know this, but the Islands are full of perilous caverns.$1#$b#They wind down under the sea and are full of monsters that never emerge above ground.$3#$b#If this adventurer is to be believed, there are huge tentacle monsters and venomous floating jellyfish. It's hard to believe they made it back to write their story!$7"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 300/showFrame Victor 37/pause 750/showFrame Victor 38/pause 450/speak Victor "The clan that protects the Fern Islands is called 'The First Slash'. They wear blue cloaks and use long spears, and are led by a fierce fighter named Ekon.$1#$b#Marlon knows him.$3#$b#They coauthored another book somewhere here in the library.$0"/pause 450/question fork0 "#Have you considered joining the Adventurer's Guild?#I want to visit the islands sometime!"/fork 2000000_JoinGuild/pause 550/speak Victor "My mother and I recently took a trip to Sautine City in the Islands. The beaches are truly a sight to behold.$3#$b#I hope we get to return soon. We take a vacation or two every year, but my mother usually chooses the destination.$1"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 37/pause 600/speak Victor "I tend to get lost in my books. This collection used to be small, but over time they've built up.$3#$b#I think I've read around three quarters of the books currently in our library, but it just seems to keep growing.$0#$b#I don't think I'll ever be able to say I've read them all.$1"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 38/pause 750/speak Victor "You have my permission to read any of the books here that catch your eye, @.$3#$b#If you want to borrow one to bring home, let me know first.$1"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1200/showFrame Victor 37/pause 2000/showFrame Victor 38/pause 1000/speak Victor "I'm going to get back to reading. Have a nice day, @. We should chat again soon!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "I got further into the book about the Fern Islands. Apparently those venomous jellyfish are called Zinnes.$7#$b#There's a wizard in the Fern Islands who brews a potion that neutralizes Zinnes venom. His potion saved the adventurer's life!$1"
Entries.2000000_JoinGuild: pause 750/showFrame Victor 38/speak Victor "!!!$7#$b#Me? Joining the Adventurer's Guild? I'll leave that to brave people like you, @.$3"/pause 1200/speak Victor "I'm thankful we have people like you to protect us. I know it's dangerous, tough work.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/showFrame Victor 37/pause 1750/showFrame Victor 38/pause 1000/speak Victor "All I do is read books all day.$1#$b#This collection of books used to be small, but over time they've built up.$3#$b#I think I've read around three quarters of the books currently in our library, but it just seems to keep growing.$0#$b#I don't think I'll ever be able to say I've read them all.$1"/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 38/pause 750/speak Victor "You have my permission to read any of the books here that catch your eye, @.$3#$b#If you want to borrow one to bring home, just let me know first.$1"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1200/showFrame Victor 37/pause 2000/showFrame Victor 38/pause 1000/speak Victor "I'm going to get back to reading. Apparently those venomous jellyfish are called Zinnes.$7#$b#There's a wizard in the Fern Islands who brews a potion that neutralizes Zinnes venom. His potion saved the adventurer's life!$1"

Entries.2000050/z winter/w sunny/t 800 1700/f Vi: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer 15 20 1 Victor 37 20 2 Linus 66 10 0/pause 1000/animate Victor false true 120 16 17 18 17 17 18 17 17 18 18 18 17 18 17 18 17 18 18 17 17 18 17 18 17 18 17 18 17 17 17 18 18 17 18 17 18 17 18/viewport 22 20 true/viewport move 1 0 10000 true/move farmer 19 0 1 true/pause 8500/stopAnimation Victor/pause 1000/move Victor 0 0 3/pause 400/emote Victor 16/speak Victor "Hello, @! Visiting Shearwater Bridge I see.$1#$b#I'm doing some calculations on its structural integrity.$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 350/speak Victor "This bridge was built forty years ago, and at the time it was a triumph of engineering. It made easy travel to and from Grampleton possible for the first time.$1#$b#Bridges fascinate me. They're so simple, but can have so much impact on people's lives.$1#$b#I've built models of a few famous ones. Someday, I want to build something on this scale.$3"/pause 600/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 650/move Victor 0 0 3/pause 850/speak Victor "There's a bridge engineer in Grampleton. His name is Ralph.#$b#When he needs help, I assist him with his work to get hands-on experience.$3"/pause 800/speak Victor "The physics and mathematics that go into bridge construction need to be absolutely flawless.$6#$b#Even a tiny mistake in a single calculation could lead to a major catastrophe.$2"/pause 1500/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 1050/showFrame Victor 19/pause 1100/showFrame Victor 16/pause 1400/showFrame Victor 19/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 0/pause 600/move Victor 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Victor "I'm returning to my residence. Need to run these calculations on my computer. It's been a pleasure speaking with you, @.$1"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "I ran those calculations I told you about. I think I've stumbled onto a real improvement plan for Shearwater Bridge!$1#$b#These structural upgrades could save 213,500G of maintenance costs over the next ten years. I should talk to Ralph right away!$1#$e#Doing work that takes a lot of brainpower makes me hungry. I wonder if there's leftover spaghetti.$3"

Entries.2000001/f Victor 1000/t 1030 1700/d Mon: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 40 95 1 Victor 45 89 3/pause 400/skippable/animate Victor false true 2250 40 40 40 41 41/viewport 46 89 true/move farmer 4 0 0/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -6 3/pause 2250/speak Victor "Hi, @...$2"/pause 700/question fork0 "#Someone in your family die?#Whose grave is that?"/fork 2000001_Graveyard/switchEvent 2000001_Graveyard
Entries.2000001_Graveyard: pause 750/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 600/stopAnimation Victor/pause 1000/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 43/pause 1500/playMusic echos/pause 850/speak Victor "This is my cat's grave. His name was Dewey.$2#$b#I commissioned Robin to carve this tombstone for him, in his memory.$6#$b#Dewey went missing shortly after my mother and I moved into the valley from Zuzu City.$2"/pause 150/emote farmer 60/pause 300/speak Victor "He had just turned two years old. We... don't know what happened to him.$2#$b#When he went missing, I was devastated. The whole town came out to help try to find him, but nobody had any luck.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "After several weeks... we accepted that he probably wasn't coming back.$2"/pause 1250/shake Victor 1500/pause 1000/speak Victor "I should have been there for him. He must have been so scared, alone in a strange place...$2"/pause 1000/speak Victor "I hope that if he's out there, he finds his way home, no matter how much time it takes.$2"/pause 800/showFrame Victor 4/pause 750/speak Victor "I'll be here when he does.$6"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/mail VictorDewey/friendship Victor 40/end dialogue Victor "I don't normally talk to anyone in the graveyard.$0"

Entries.2000002/f Victor 1500/t 1000 1700/w sunn: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 89 56 2 Victor 97 61 1/pause 400/skippable/showFrame Victor 43/viewport 95 62 true/move farmer 0 7 1/pause 1150/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 750/showFrame Victor 4/pause 1000/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 600/speak Victor "Hi, @.$6"/pause 400/emote farmer 40/speak Victor "Oh, what am I doing? I'm... well, just thinking at the moment. I have a lot on my mind.$6"/pause 600/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 550/showFrame Victor 43/pause 700/playMusic desolate/pause 1500/speak Victor "My mother told me she's disappointed I haven't found a job yet. I came to the park to get out of the house for a while.$2#$b#I can't blame her for feeling that way. I graduated from university a year ago and I'm still living at home.$2#$b#Maybe she thinks I'm just lazy and comfortable living at home forever because we're financially secure.$6#$b#But that's... not the case at all.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "Over the last year, I've turned down dozens of internships and job offers. None of them appealed to me.$2#$b#I don't want to move out of the valley and work myself to death in the city.$2#$b#I want a career where I'm free to be who I am, not who I'm told to become.$6"/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 4/pause 1000/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 750/speak Victor "You understand what I'm saying, @. You quit your office job because that wasn't true to who you were.$6#$b#You took a leap of faith and took over your grandpa's farm. Just look at how that transformed your life!$3#$b#In a way... I envy you, @.$2"/pause 1200/question fork0 "#Working at Joja was the worst.#You should move to the city and get a job."/fork 2000002_FindYourPassion/pause 800/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 43/pause 1000/speak Victor "I know there aren't many jobs here in the valley, @. You can't do much here unless you freelance or are willing to commute two hours to Zuzu City.$2#$b#Like I said before, I don't want to move away. I love living here, and I can't see myself going anywhere else.$6"/pause 1500/speak Victor "I lived in Zuzu City all my life with my parents. Moving to Stardew Valley... it was the first time I felt like I was home.$6"/pause 1250/speak Victor "Imagine how you would feel if you suddenly moved back to your city after finding this place. It'd feel like being a plant, uprooted.$6"/pause 1050/emote farmer 60/pause 600/speak Victor "Then you understand what I mean.$6"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor -125/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I appreciate you talking to me at the park. You're a good listener.$6"
Entries.2000002_FindYourPassion: pause 750/speak Victor "A career like that sounds dreadful. Having a boss telling you what to do and how to feel.$2#$b#Working that much... that's essentially over half your life that doesn't belong to you.$6"/pause 1250/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 43/pause 1000/speak Victor "My mother doesn't understand what I'm going through...$6#$e#She and the rest of my family keep pressuring me to jump into a high-paying career. It seems like no one cares how I feel about it.$2#$e#There aren't many jobs here in the valley unless you freelance work or are willing to commute an hour to Zuzu City.$6#$b#That's two hours a day, with good traffic...$2"/pause 1250/showFrame Victor 4/pause 800/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 1000/speak Victor "I'm optimistic I'll figure this all out soon enough, @.$3#$e#Thanks for hearing me out. See you around.$1/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor 75/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I appreciate you talking to me at the park. You're a good listener.$3#$b#I consider you one of my closest friends.$1"

Wh-what!?$7"/pause 600/shake Olivia 2000/pause 700/speak Olivia "YOU'VE BEEN TURNING DOWN JOB OFFERS!?$5"/pause 300/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -2 1/move Victor 0 0 2/speed farmer 4/move farmer 2 0 2 true/speak Victor "I've been doing nothing of the sort! It's always a dusty wreck.$6#$b#My father is coming to visit soon, and I wanted the house to be perfect for his arrival.$6"/pause 1000/speak Olivia "I found a note that says you've been turning down internships and job offers.$5#$b#This is why you haven't found a job after graduating!? Why, Victor?$5#$b#What is the point of this charade? Don't you want to have a successful career?$2"/pause 1350/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 1850/shake Olivia 1500/pause 700/speak Olivia "ANSWER ME!$5"/pause 400/speak Victor "I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT I WANTED TO DO!$5"/pause 500/emote Olivia 16/pause 400/move Olivia 0 -1 0/pause 400/speak Olivia "That's all you have to say for yourself?! After all the money I spent sending you to Pellcar University?...$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 250/speak Olivia "Victor, I'm buying a one-bedroom apartment for you in Zuzu City. I'll give you some starting money, and then I'm cutting you off.$0"/pause 300/emote Victor 16/pause 500/shake Victor 1000/pause 500/speak Olivia "You're moving out, Victor. Now. Maybe being back in the city without my bank account to rely on will inspire you to start living your life.$5"/pause 500/speak Victor "Mom, no! Please, just let me explain! Entries.2000003_Eavesdropping: pause 500/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Victor "Mom. Please. Let me talk so you can understand my side of the story. At least give me that.$2"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1000/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1200/speak Olivia "Okay.$2"/pause 750/question fork1 "#Don't say anything#Listen to your mom and move to the city."/fork 2000003_VictorTalk/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 2/emote Victor 16/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 300/speak Victor "!!!$7"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 800/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Olivia "See, Victor? Even @ agrees it would be in your best interest to move to Zuzu City.$0#$b#This is the best path to get you out of this slump, honey.$0"/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 0/pause 400/shake Victor 700/pause 700/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 750/speak Olivia "Thank you for your input, @. Victor and I will continue discussing this matter. Alone. You may leave.$0"/pause 500/emote Victor 28/pause 600/speed farmer 2/move farmer -6 0 3 true/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor -1250/end dialogue Victor "Why did you agree with my mother about sending me to Zuzu City? It took me hours to talk her down.$2#$b#I'm not just wasting my life here. I'm starting an apprenticeship with a retired bridge builder in Grampleton.$0#$b#I thought you were my friend, but you hurt my feelings and betrayed my trust...$2#$e#Don't talk to me right now, @.$5#$e#%Victor is now ignoring you."
Entries.2000003_VictorTalk: pause 1200/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 1000/speak Victor "Mom...$2"/pause 600/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Mom, I enjoyed what I studied in school.$0#$b#The reason I've turned down job offers is because I know exactly what I want to do with my life, and it doesn't involve internships in the city.$6"/pause 1250/speak Victor "I want to build and maintain bridges. Not just any bridges, but the bridges here in the valley and surrounding provinces.$3"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 43/pause 600/speak Victor "This was going to be a surprise. I didn't want to tell you until it was official but...$2"/pause 100/emote Olivia 8/pause 200/showFrame Victor 4/pause 300/speak Victor "I've been working closely with Kendra, the mayor of Grampleton, and their bridge engineer, Ralph. He recently retired.$3#$b#Ralph is responsible for constructing and managing the bridges in the region, including the ones here in Pelican town.$1"/pause 150/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "Are you saying you...?$6"/pause 500/speak Victor "Yes. I'm an apprentice.$1#$b#Ralph is teaching me the ins and outs of bridge construction and maintenance. I've been waiting for a position like this to open up for a long time.$3"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Honey! This is incredible news! I wish you had told me sooner.$1"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/pause 400/speak Victor "I thought it'd be best to tell you when it was official so I didn't get your hopes up if it didn't happen.$2#$b#But I probably should have told you sooner, since you've been so worried about my future.$2"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Those notes in my diary are very old, from a time when I was feeling frustrated and lacking direction. Now I know what I want to do with my life.$6"/pause 500/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/speak Olivia "...$2"/pause 650/speak Olivia "I... I'm sorry for violating your privacy, honey. It was unfair to assume you were putting off work to keep living here.$2"/pause 1250/speak Victor "Part of that is true, mother. I don't want to move away from Stardew Valley. Departing from my friends and the valley would make me miserable.$6#$b#If I had moved to the city and gotten an office job, I'd be nothing but a cog in a machine, unable to chase my dreams.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "I feel like I can achieve so much more if I control my own destiny. And right now, working with Ralph, I can.$1"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Honey, I'm so proud of you!$1"/pause 500/speak Victor "Thank you, mother!$3"/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "We celebrated Victor's internship with the finest aged Blue Moon Vineyard wine and exchanged laughs."/stopMusic/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I'm sorry you got caught between my mother and me. I didn't want to let anyone know about my apprenticeship until I knew it was for certain.$6#$b#Getting the internship doesn't mean my future is secure. I have a lot of learning and work ahead of me, but I'm happy to know which direction my life is heading.$3#$e#Thank you for being a good friend.$1"

BeforeMovie.Text: My, my! My absolute favorite genre. Thank you for inviting me out, dear.$3

AfterMovie.Text: The movie was splendid, @!$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Caroline said this movie was frightening! I'll be prepared for any jump scares.$1

AfterMovie.Text: I had a wonderful time. We should see another movie again sometime, dear.$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Let's head in early to get good seats, @.$0

AfterMovie.Text: The story was remarkable and engaging.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I've heard good reviews about this film.$3

AfterMovie.Text: The film was quite the experience, dear. Thank you for the invite.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I have a feeling this film will be a disappointment...$2

AfterMovie.Text: I appreciate your company, dear.$3

Entries.Olivia: My, my. What a beautiful day for a festival.$0#$e#Are you participating in the egg hunt, @?$3
I just love celebrating the spring, don't you, sweetie?$1#$b#Are you going on the egg hunt? I'll be cheering for you.$3
Gatherings such as this give me a great opportunity to talk to Caroline and Jodi.$3
Lovely of you to make it to the festival, honey.$3#$e#Let's partake in the buffet soon.$1
The governor has honored us with his presence, @!$1#$b#I may try speaking with him after Mayor Lewis has finished his conversation. Perhaps he enjoys vintage wine?$3
The soup smells delicious. I might even have seconds, sweetie. Don't tell anyone.$1#$e#I love you, honey.$4
The sky is clear tonight. A flawless backdrop of moonlight for the jellies, wouldn't you say @?$3
The sea is beautiful at night. I'm so happy we can experience the moonlight jellies together.$3#$e#Maybe we can hold hands?$4
Are you enjoying the fair, sweetie?$3
Are you putting on a Grange Display, sweetie?$0#$b#Best of luck if you do. I know how hard you’ve worked this year.$3
I heard screams coming from the maze. What could possibly be in there!?$2
Pierre's spiced pumpkin cider is astonishing. Here, let me pour you a glass.$3#$e#Happy Spirit's Eve, honey.$4
Brr... I should have worn an extra layer.$2#$e#Are you participating in the fishing competition?$3
It’s quite chilly out here, isn't it, sweetie?$2#$b#When we go home, let's get cozy in some blankets. I'll mull some spiced wine for us.$4
Merry Winter Star, dear!$3#$e#Isn't it wonderful how happy everyone is on a day such as this?$1
This time of year makes me so appreciative of family.$3#$b#I'm glad you came into my life, @.$4

Entries.4000001/f Olivia 500/k 2000003: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer -300 -300 0 Victor 20 38 1 Olivia 22 38 3/pause 400/skippable/viewport 20 37 true/pause 1000/speak Olivia "Honey, I just don't understand why this process is everlasting.$2"/pause 500/speak Victor "I'm trying, Mother. There aren't many jobs this far away from the city.$2"/pause 800/speak Olivia "Do you think you'll move back to Zuzu City?$0"/pause 50/speak Victor "No. I have no intention of moving back there. I want to stay here in Stardew Valley.$7"/speak Olivia "Well, you'd better start applying yourself more to finding a job nearby then, Victor.$5"/pause 250/shake Victor 1000/pause 800/warp farmer 20 42/playSound doorClose/pause 200/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 250/move Olivia 0 0 2/emote farmer 8/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 350/move Olivia 0 0 3/speak Victor "I'm stepping outside to get some air.$2"/pause 300/move Victor 0 1 2/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 250/move farmer -1 0 1/pause 300/move Victor 0 3 2/pause 150/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 150/warp Victor -500 -500/playSound doorClose/stopMusic/pause 850/emote Olivia 28/pause 300/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Olivia "My apologies, @. I lost my composure.$2"/pause 1000/speak Olivia "Victor gets... defensive whenever I bring up his career.$2#$b#He's very bright. Top of his class in school, and he always has his nose buried in some obscure book. I don't know why he hasn't found a job yet.$0"/pause 600/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 700/shake Olivia 800/pause 1250/speak Olivia "I feel as if he may have gotten too comfortable living at home. I worry for his future.$2"/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 650/speak Olivia "I have business I must attend to. You may stay and browse the library if you wish, dear.$2"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Olivia 25/end dialogue Olivia "I hope Victor chooses a path for his future soon... I understand he needs time, but he mustn't wallow.$2#$e#...$2"

Entries.4000002/f Olivia 1000/f Jodi 250/f Carol: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 29 89 0 Olivia 24 72 3 Jodi 22 72 1 Caroline 23 71 2 Penny 7 65 2 Lewis 31 67 1 Pierre 33 67 3 MarlonFay 33 103 2 Wizard 33 105 0 Gus 42 72 2 Abigail 47 88 0 Haley 16 90 3 Emily 14 90 1 Linus 104 104 2 Clint 97 77 0 Victor 40 16 0/pause 400/showFrame Penny 18/skippable/viewport 23 72 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -16 3 true/speak Jodi "That's hilarious, Olivia. Moments like this with Victor are a treasure.$1"/speak Caroline "Abigail used to do that too.$0"/speak Olivia "Imagine if you'd known this is what parenthood is like!$1"/emote Jodi 8/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 350/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 750/emote farmer 32/speak Caroline "Hi, @!$0"/pause 400/speak Jodi "It's nice to see you, @. It's a beautiful day today, isn't it?$0"/speak Olivia "Hello, dear! It's wonderful to see you!$1"/emote farmer 20/textAboveHead Pierre "Ah, yes! That is what I mean, Lewis."/pause 200/move farmer -6 0 0 true/pause 2400/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 300/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Caroline "@, I heard about %farm Farm on the radio a few days ago. You're making so much progress!$0"/speak Jodi "Oh, yes! You are, @. You've helped our little community to grow.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Olivia "Vineyards are quite profitable in this region. I heard rumors about how much Sophia makes each quarter.$3"/speak Caroline "How much is it!?"/speak Jodi "!!!$0"/pause 200/textAboveHead Lewis "I'm happy to hear that, Pierre."/pause 750/speak Olivia "It's over six figures!$1"/emote Jodi 16 true/pause 200/emote Caroline 16 true/pause 100/emote farmer 16 true/pause 750/speak Olivia "@. Have you considered turning %farm Farm into a vineyard, like Blue Moon Vineyard?$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 600/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#I'm already making wine.#Wine production isn't the path I want to go down.#I'm not at the level where I can make large amounts of wine yet."/fork 4000002_MakesWine/pause 500/speak Olivia "I understand. Take your time, dear. If you do ever decide to turn your hand to winemaking, let me know. I want to try the first batch!$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/emote Olivia 32/pause 500/speak Caroline "Pierre loves getting shipments of your crops from Mayor Lewis, @!$0#$b#He says they rival the quality of his own produce.$0"/speak Jodi "I wish Susan sold her crops locally. She ships her produce out of the valley.$6#$b#She once let me purchase one of her fresh melons. It was so delicious!$1"/pause 600/textAboveHead Pierre "You're a great friend, Lewis!"/pause 600/speak Olivia "I'm just relieved Pierre never sells Andy's crops in his store. I think they're shipped to low income villages.$6"/pause 200/emote farmer 16 true/pause 300/emote Jodi 16/speak Caroline "It's true, Olivia. My husband and Andy had an argument recently.$2#$b#Pierre would only allow Andy's produce in the store if it was specifically labeled as: 'Grown at Fairhaven Farm'. Andy didn't like that...$2"/pause 400/speak Jodi "...$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 700/speak Olivia "Well, this conversation certainly turned sour.$2"/pause 1650/speak Olivia "@, we're going back to chatting about parenthood.$6"/pause 250/speak Caroline "It was nice seeing you, @!$0"/speak Jodi "Bye, @.$0"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 8 0 1 true/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Olivia 25/end dialogue Olivia "Come chat with us again next time, dear.$3"

There's a magic to live music that recordings don't capture. Once, I went to see her perform with an orchestra. Entries.4000004_ListenViolin: pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 1500/speak Olivia "... I'm hopeful she'll be okay.$2"/friendship Olivia 50/pause 1000/switchEvent 4000004_Immigrants
Entries.4000004_Immigrants: pause 200/speak Olivia "My side of the family is from the Gotoro Empire. My mother and father immigrated to the Ferngill Republic.$2"/pause 1100/speak Olivia "I have family and friends there, trapped and unable to leave. I worry for their safety.$2#$b#I don't know if they're okay or not. It's impossible to call or write to any of them.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 600/shake Olivia 1100/pause 300/move farmer -1 0 3 true/pause 1500/speak Olivia "I've heard rumors of what's happening. I don't want to believe any of it.$2"/pause 900/speak Olivia "I need a glass of wine.$2"/pause 600/move Olivia -5 0 0/pause 650/playSound wateringCan/shake Olivia 750/pause 250/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 1400/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Olivia "Here's something you've never tasted, @. Ringfruit wine, aged 30 years, from the Fern Islands.$3"/pause 400/emote farmer 20/pause 800/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 600/move farmer 0 0 2/showFrame farmer 90/playSound pickUpItem/pause 1200/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1600/speak Olivia "You may have met Suki, the traveling merchant. She visits the forest on weekends to sell goods from Gotoro.$0"/pause 1000/speak Olivia "It's sad... the only way we can get anything from home is buying smuggled goods.$2"/pause 700/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 23/pause 1250/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1000/speak Olivia "I purchased a rare Gotoran china dish from her a few weeks ago.$0#$b#It's from a particularly ostentatious pattern. I put it on display in the kitchen cabinet upstairs.$3#$b#I wonder... where did that set come from? What family sold it off, piece by piece, so they could afford to eat?$2"/pause 800/showFrame farmer 91/pause 350/showFrame farmer 92/pause 300/showFrame farmer 93/pause 250/playSound gulp/pause 750/showFrame farmer 92/pause 350/showFrame farmer 91/pause 250/showFrame farmer 90/pause 750/question fork1 "#I've met Suki. BeforeMovie.Text: Heard about this here movie on the radio. Suppose' to be good!$0

AfterMovie.Text: Now that is what I call a movie. Thank you kindly for invitin' me!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: That was a mighty good show.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Heh. Film was alright. Actin' could use some work.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Suppose I will give this genre a shot...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Was not a fan of that film. Brought back some memories I don't want to be doin' any thinkin' about...$2

Entries.Andy: The food at these festivals ain't so bad.$1#$e#It'd taste even better if Pierre and Lewis used my crops.$2
I found some leeks durin' our walk over here! This stuff is better than most of the food here.$1#$e#Nothin' like some ale with a leek.$0
Mayor Lewis has been chattin' up the governor this entire festival. What are those two talkin' about?$2#$e#I hope they're not talkin' bout me. He's probably got nothin' good to say.$2
If these jellies don't show in the next 10 minutes, I'm gettin' outta here. Wastin' my evening.$2
I know I don't have a snowball's chance in you-know-where at winnin'. Just wanna show everyone how hard I've been workin' this season.$0#$e#I pride myself in what I do.$1

Pierre's spiced pumpkin cider is amazin'! I wish he'd let me buy it off of him!$1#$e#He should at least sell some of it to Gus so I can get it at the saloon.$2#$e#Good luck in that there maze, farmer. I've heard some screams comin' from that direction.$0
I overheard Willy talkin' about you. It'll be a close match between you two.$0#$e#Good luck fishin', @.$1
Best part about today is the free food and drink. Don't care much about gift givin'.$2

Entries.5000003_Cliff: pause 600/speak Andy "Let's get out of these shrubs.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 300/warp Andy 81 99/warp farmer 83 99/pause 100/move Andy 0 0 2/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 100/viewport 82 100 true/playMusic ocean/pause 2500/move Andy 0 0 3/pause 1000/move Andy 0 0 2/pause 1000/speak Andy "Hmm. That Shane fella left this mess here. I had nothin' to do with it.$2#$b#He used to come here to drink. Don't see him much now.$0"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/speak Andy "I do the same at Alexa's abandoned farmhouse. Shane and I don't talk much but we have some things in common.$0"/pause 1000/speak Andy "Both support Joja and heavy drinkers. Heh.$1"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 1500/speak Andy "Things are tough when you're all on your own, farmer. I don't have many people I'd call close friends in my life.$2"/pause 200/emote Andy 40/pause 400/speak Andy "Ya know, I tried talkin' Mayor Lewis into lettin' Sophia, Susan and I take over your grandpa's farm. It was good land bein' left to spoil.$0#$b#There was nothing Lewis could do 'bout it. Your grandpa still owned the deed to that there land.$2#$b#You showed up outta no where and took it over. Been doin' a Yoba darn good job too.$0"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/shake Andy 1000/pause 1200/showFrame Andy 22/pause 700/stopMusic/speak Andy "... What I'm tryin' to say is.$8"/pause 1300/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 500/speak Andy "I'm proud of you.$8"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 100/speak Andy "I won't lie. I used to be jealous of ya. You only started farm work recently, relatively speakin'. I've been doin' this all my life and I haven't amounted to much.$8"/pause 700/move Andy 0 0 2/pause 600/move Andy 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Andy "At first, I thought you'd move out of the valley because you couldn't handle the farmwork. City kid. Goin' from that office job to farmin' is a radical change in lifestyle.$0#$b#But you didn't. You kept at it. Kept improvin' and showin' me I was wrong. I can tell you're passionate about farmin' as best you can.$2#$b#You've brought more commerce to the valley with the publicity of %farm Farm. All the farmers are sellin' more as a result.$0"/pause 400/shake Andy 1000/pause 700/speak Andy "I suppose what what I'm really tryin' to say here is..."/pause 750/move Andy 0 0 2/pause 750/showFrame Andy 22/pause 1000/speak Andy "Thank you.$8"/pause 1000/move Andy 0 0 2/pause 1200/speak Andy "Thank you for inspirin' me to be a better person and givin' Fairhaven Farm more business. It's helped my life more'n you know.$0"/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/playMusic ocean/pause 1300/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Andy 2 true/pause 2000/speak Andy "Good view from here.$0#$b#Gotta say. This right here is the Ferngillian dream. Livin' in Stardew Valley.$1#$b#Thanks for bein' a good friend and showin' me compassion, @."/pause 1200/move Andy 0 0 1/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1200/speak Andy "Now, I'm gonna go back to foragin'. Not quite done yet today.$0"/pause 1000/speak Andy "Drop by later. I want to give you somethin'.$1"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 250/friendship Andy 50/end dialogue Andy "Thanks for everythin', @. I know I might have a strange view on things or act a little weird, but that didn't stop you from bein' a good friend to me.$1#$b#Here, take this. Found it in the forest while foragin'. Not so sure what it is. Maybe you could use 'em.[114]$0#$e#Have an excellent day, farmer. Keep up all the good work you're always doin'.$1"

BeforeMovie.Text: This movie is about a sapling. How cute.$0

DuringMovie.Text: Aww. The sappling is so adorable!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me out, @. I want to go home and water my little babies.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: Brr... It's freezing. I'm glad the building is warm.$0

AfterMovie.Text: The film felt very authentic, with the story and special effects.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope there are still seats left.$0

AfterMovie.Text: I enjoyed the movie. Did anything stand out to you?$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I haven't seen this genre in forever. I'm anxious to see it!$0

AfterMovie.Text: I wonder if this film will come out on VHS soon! I'll get it!$0

BeforeMovie.Text: It isn't my favorite genra, but I'll give it a go.$0

AfterMovie.Text: *yawn* Thanks for inviting me, @.$0

Entries.Susan: Jas and Vincent are so excited to hunt for the eggs around town. I hope they find lots of them!$1#$e#I'm thinking about getting a second helping of ham and veggies.$0
What a beautiful day for the Flower Festival.$4#$e#Are you planning on dancing with someone?$1
It's nice to have the governor in the valley. Mayor Lewis worked so hard to make the Luau perfect.$0#$e#I wonder if that slow roast ham Linus is making is almost ready.$1
I'm awfully afraid of large bodies of water. I'll be here on the beach, where it's safe.$0
I'm happy I get to showcase my best produce and artisan goods to everyone.$4#$b#Emerald Farm had a strong year!$1
So these are shadow brutes? They look menacing...$2
When I was younger, my father and I loved to fish together. Haven't fished at all since then.$0#$b#I think you'll do great in the contest, @.$1#$e#Best of luck to you, honey!$4
He loved the gift I gave him! I knew he'd appreciate it.$1

Entries.1000077/j 30: kindadumbautumn/-200 -200/farmer 2 2 2 Susan 3 3 0/skippable/pause 1500/speak Susan "Hello! I'm Susan, the owner of Emerald Farm up at the railroad.$4#$b#I've been trapped up there alone ever since Joja caused the rockslide, so I've got a little bit of cabin fever.$0#$b#Happy to finally meet you, @.$1"/pause 1000/faceDirection Susan 1 true/pause 900/faceDirection Susan 0/pause 600/speak Susan "Stop by and visit Emerald Farm when you have the time!$1"/pause 250/end dialogue Susan "I'm thankful Joja cleared the rockslide. Lewis and I went through so much trouble getting them to remove the rocks.$2#$b#Joja still refuses to apologize...$3#$e#I'll see you again soon, dear!$1#$b#It's lovely having another farmer in the valley.$0"

Entries.1000078/f Susan 500/t 600 1150/z winter/: breezy/-500 -500/farmer 34 54 1 Susan 45 52 2 MarlonFay 15 20 2 Wizard 15 22 0/pause 500/skippable/viewport 35 51 true/viewport move 1 0 6100 true/move farmer 4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 900/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Susan "@! Hello!$1#$b#I'm refreshing my little guys with patented homemade fertilizer.$0#$b#Nitrogen, potassium, and phosphorous are part of what makes Emerald Farm's produce delicious.$4#$b#Just add sunshine, water, and some love, and you've got yourself a profitable season!$1"/pause 900/move Susan -2 0 3/pause 1200/move Susan 0 0 0/pause 1000/speak Susan "Emerald Farm is small in comparison to %farm Farm. I can't imagine managing that much space.$0"/pause 1000/question fork0 "How are you able to keep up with all of that land?#Honestly, it's because I never take breaks.#I automate watering with sprinklers."/fork 1000078_NoBreaks/pause 500/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 350/speak Susan "Oh! I've tried crafting sprinklers, but I can't seem to get the plumbing just right.$0#$b#I'm amazed you can craft such sophisticated devices.$4"/pause 700/speak Susan "With how many acres %farm Farm covers, if you want to use all that space, automation's probably a must.$1#$b#I don't think it'd be possible for one person to maintain, unless you hired a few farmhands to help.$0#$b#Most farmers near Pelican Town are small enough to be self-sufficient, but the orchards in Chestervale bring on seasonal help for the harvest.$1"/pause 1000/move Susan 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Susan "I need to finish fertilizing before the afternoon heat hits. Talk to you soon!$1"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Susan was in a cheerful mood today!"/end dialogue Susan "Thank you for visiting me earlier, @.$1#$e#The way you handle running a farm that big makes me feel motivated to chase bigger dreams.$4#$e#Have a nice day, dear!$1"

She's an accomplished woodworker. You should meet her sometime!$0"

Entries.1000081/f Susan 2000/w sunny/z winter/t: spaceMusic/-500 -500/farmer 12 20 1 Susan 46 20 3 Linus 46 10 0/pause 750/move farmer 16 0 1 true/move Susan -16 0 3 true/skippable/viewport 29 28 true/viewport move 0 -1 9000 true/pause 5500/emote Susan 16 true/pause 2000/speak Susan "Good evening, @. Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sophia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sophia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Sophia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Sophia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I can't believe they made a Prairie King movie... I hope it's good!

AfterMovie.Text: The movie was so so great! Thanks for taking me!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope this movie is good! I think there's a cute character in it!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Raccoons are so so adorable!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Let's go get the good seats, @!$1

AfterMovie.Text: What part was your favorite?$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Hey, you! Thanks for inviting me, I love going to the movies.$1

AfterMovie.Text: There were some silly parts, but I liked it.$9

BeforeMovie.Text: I-I don't know about this one. I'm just here for the snacks.$1

AfterMovie.Text: I think I'd rate that a 5 out of 10.$0

Entries.Sophia: I get nervous around large crowds of people...$2
Hey, you! Want to get some food with me?$4#$e#I already had a plate. This will be my second.$9
I'm here for the free cake.$1

I added aged Blue Moon Wine for the adult pot!$9#$e#I hope the other ingredients people put in are tasty!$1
Want to go swimming after we eat?$1#$e#I have a new bikini.$4
The jellyfish are so pretty!$1#$b#I love watching them every year.$9
Hey, you. See the faint glow out there?$4#$e#The moonlight jellyfish are coming to the shore!$9#$e#%You hold Sophia's hand. She smiles at you.
I'm presenting my best aged wine from Blue Moon Vineyard!$1#$e#I worked hard to make these!$9#$e#Oh. Um. So what's in your grange display?$1
We are competing against each other today.$1#$b#May the best one win!$3#$e#Oh. Um. I love you!$4#$b#Good luck!$9
I went into the maze and gave up.$2#$e#Why? Oh. I was hungry.$1#$e#Have you tried Pierre's spiced pumpkin cider?$9
Hey, you. Getting food too?$1#$e#Hey! Um. Those monsters in the cages. Have you fought those before?$0#$e#You're so brave, my hero.$4
Mmm. So pretty here.$9#$e#There's no food, but that's okay. I brought snacks.$1
I want to build a snowman!$9#$b#Come on! Let's make one, silly.$1#$e#Aww. Okay. After the fishing contest then!$1
Who's a good boy!? You are!$9#$e#Did you get a present yet?$1
Hey, you! I thought I'd pet Dusty for a little bit.$1#$b#He's Pelican Town's best boy!$9#$e#Oh. Um. I'll join you at a table soon. Save me a seat?$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Horror films test my integrity. Let us procure our seats.$0

DuringMovie.Text: No jump scare will get to me...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Thank you kindly for the invite, @. That was quite enjoyable.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: This genre of film is not my favorite, but I'll give it a go...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Hmm. I don't have much to say about the film...$0

BeforeMovie.Text: Well. Let us grab seats post haste, @.

AfterMovie.Text: Interesting film. Acting was a little sub-par, though.

BeforeMovie.Text: Hmm. There's something magical about this theater. I can feel it in the air...$0

AfterMovie.Text: I was engrossed in the film. Thank you kindly for the invite, @.

BeforeMovie.Text: Well. Let's watch the movie, @.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Hmm. I didn't pay too much attention.$0

Entries.MarlonFay: Even with my bad leg, I never miss a town festival.
I'll be back here by the trees... the air is a lot cooler.
Clint's blades get sharper every year.#$e#So do his prices...$2
Took a mighty amount of effort to catch these monsters.$2#$b#Most of the credit goes to the Castle Village adventurers.#$e#Don't get too close to the cage.
If you spot any frost slimes, alert me.$0#$e#We're deep in the forest. Anything can be out there in the woods.

Entries.1000034/e 100162/j 8: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer 6 19 0 MarlonFay 6 13 2/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 17/viewport 6 14 true/skippable/playSound doorClose/pause 800/shake MarlonFay 600/textAboveHead MarlonFay "You've proven yourself!"/pause 150/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 700/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 600/speak MarlonFay "You've ventured into the mines with utmost courage, @!#$b#We could use someone with your skills. Do you want to join the Adventurer's Guild?"/pause 1000/jump farmer/pause 800/jump farmer/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "@...$2#$b#Do you swear under oath, to protect humanity from monsters, and to do everything in your power to uphold the traditions, values, and ideology of the Adventurer's Guild?$0"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1400/move MarlonFay 0 1 2/pause 700/speak MarlonFay "On behalf of Stardew Valley and the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras, I officially accept you as the 23rd Adventurer's Guild member!$1"/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "As a member of the Adventurer's Guild, you will be allowed to purchase rare weapons we commission and discover!#$b#There are also bounties and quests you can access from the notice board behind me!"/pause 700/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 350/emote farmer 8/speak MarlonFay "Don't mind Gil. He just took some of his meds and he's dozing off. I'll inform him of our new member when he awakens."/pause 700/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 750/speak MarlonFay "Welcome to the guild, @. I expect great things from you."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue MarlonFay "How is adventuring? If you need a sharper sword, I can put in a good word with Clint."

Entries.1050034/e 1000034/j 30/k 1090501/f Marlo: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer -200 -200 0 MarlonFay 4 11 2/pause 1000/viewport 6 14 true/skippable/pause 3000/warp farmer 6 19/playSound doorClose/pause 500/textAboveHead MarlonFay "Ah. You're back."/pause 330/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "@. I've been meaning to have a conversation with you.#$b#I'm sure you have several questions as to who we are, what we do, and the history of this guild.#$b#If you would please join me in my quarters, I'll explain all of this to you."/pause 500/question fork0 "#I'd like to hear the history of the guild.#Sounds like a long talk. No thanks."/fork 1050034_GuildHistory/pause 800/speak MarlonFay "Hmm. I see. If that's your choice, so be it.$2"/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "Do you need a new weapon? Take a look at what we have in stock."/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end position 4 13
Entries.1050034_GuildHistory: pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "Follow me."/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/warp farmer 4 5/warp MarlonFay 6 5/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 250/viewport 7 6 true/pause 1500/speak MarlonFay "Hmm... where to begin..."/pause 600/emote MarlonFay 40/pause 200/speak MarlonFay "I'll start with the history of the guild.#$b#I founded the Adventurer's Guild over 25 years ago, after being recognized by the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras.#$b#Our Order is made up of over fifty guilds and clans around the world, spanning every continent.#$b#Our mission is to protect humanity from monsters corrupted by ancient dark magic. No one knows when this corruption started, or how it began.#$b#Some ancient legends speak of a past time when monsters and humans lived in peace. If those times were ever real, they now only exist in stories.#$b#So we, the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras, have sworn an oath to protect humans from those monsters. We are, in a way, monster hunters."/pause 1050/speak MarlonFay "This guild in particular works closely with M. Rasmodius. You may know him as the 'Wizard'.#$b#Every guild has a wizard or witch that supports them. It's paramount our weapons are imbued with magic to pierce the life force of monsters.#$b#You may wonder why we use swords instead of conventional weapons.#$b#To destroy the life force of a monster, you must pierce their life force fibers in a slashing movement.#$b#This is the only way to ensure the monster is defeated, or else it will regenerate.#$b#Projectile weapons unfortunately don't do the trick. They are able to stun monsters, but they still require a good horizontal slash to finish them off.#$b#If you ever use a projectile weapon, you may understand what I mean, unless you use explosives or iridium ammunition."/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "Alesia was a gifted sniper who used magic-imbued arrows. She used to be a member of this guild before she moved to Castle Village in the desert.#$b#She used her arrows to stun monsters before finishing them with her dagger."/pause 1000/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 800/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "You may have noticed you're the 23rd adventurer, but there are only a few of us here. We used to have many more members.#$b#Over time, people have left to join other guilds and... and we..."/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 19/pause 650/speak MarlonFay "We have lost a lot of good people over the years. What we do is dangerous, and it's a thankless job.#$b#Thanks for joining our cause. Your help in protecting the valley is greatly appreciated. I feel as if we're a fully functioning guild again."/pause 800/speak MarlonFay "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 marlon_event2#I'll do everything I can to protect people.#$r -1 0 marlon_event5#It's dangerous and risky. Someone needs to do it."/pause 1000/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 1000/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "I'm proud to hear that from you. You have the potential to be an excellent swordsman."/pause 1250/speak MarlonFay "You may be wondering why the mine entrance isn't sealed off.#$b#Unfortunately, Joja owns the rights to the mines and won't allow us to seal it.#$b#It's strange. They don't utilize the mines in any way, despite bountiful amounts of ore.#$b#Because of this, we must venture into the mines and slay monsters before they accumulate in mass."/pause 600/speak MarlonFay "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 marlon_event4#There must be strong monsters deep in the mines...#$r -1 0 marlon_event3#I'll prove I have what it takes!"/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "I must disclose to you that not every monster is corrupted and hostile.#$b#There is a Shadow Person living in the sewer. His name is 'Krobus'. Rasmodius and I have been harboring him.#$b#This is to remain a secret. You'll meet Krobus soon enough. I need to see you prove your worth before I introduce you to him.$2"/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "I believe that's enough conversation for you today. I'll speak with you again soon on other matters.#$b#I need to check on a new stock of weapons we just received from the new blacksmith in Castle Village."/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue MarlonFay "Remember what I said. Krobus is to remain a secret. There would be dire consequences if anyone got wind of him."

Entries.1004200/b 1/w rainy/f MarlonFay 1000: continue/-500 -500/farmer 22 37 0 MarlonFay 22 15 2/pause 1000/skippable/viewport 22 28 true/viewport move 0 -1 4000 true/move MarlonFay 0 9 2 true/move farmer 0 -11 0 true/pause 5000/speak MarlonFay "Greetings, @. I don't believe I've seen you up here before."/pause 1150/speak MarlonFay "I visit this graveyard to pay my respects to those who sacrificed their lives to keep the valley safe."/pause 1200/showFrame MarlonFay 19/pause 1600/speak MarlonFay "Many of these adventurers were my friends...$2"/pause 750/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 1250/speak MarlonFay "I went on an expedition in the mines with a couple First Slash adventurers who were eager to test their mettle.#$b#Imagine their disappointment when we found that the monsters have been thinned out! The progress you've made single-handedly is impressive.$1#$b#Your assistance in keeping the valley safe is a debt I don't think I'll ever be able to repay.$0#$b#To tell you the truth, you remind me of myself when I was your age.$2"/pause 500/emote MarlonFay 40/speak MarlonFay "Magnus Rasmodius and I privately meet regarding new monster hunters, wizards, witches, and adventurers who join our order."/move MarlonFay 0 1 2/pause 700/speak MarlonFay "I want you to join our meetings, @. Your insight would prove most helpful. What do you say?"/pause 500/question fork0 "#I would be honored to join the meetings.#I'm humbled, but I'll leave that to you two."/fork 1004200_Agree/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "I understand, @. Keep up the good work protecting Stardew Valley."/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "I'll speak to you again regarding other matters.$2"/move MarlonFay 0 8 2 true/move farmer -1 0 2 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/end position 21 27
Entries.1004200_Agree: pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "I'll let you know when we have our next meeting.#$b#We usually meet at the guild building or at Magnus' tower.#$b#Sometimes we rent a room at the Stardrop Saloon so we can enjoy good food and drink too."/pause 1500/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 1500/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "I must be on my way, @...$2"/pause 800/move MarlonFay 0 8 2 true/move farmer -1 0 2 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/end dialogue MarlonFay "I'll inform you the next time there's a council meeting."

Entries.1090501/e 1000034/b 1/f MarlonFay 1250: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer -100 -100 0 Krobus -300 -300 3 MarlonFay 4 11 2/rustyKey/skippable/viewport 6 13 true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 19/pause 400/textAboveHead MarlonFay "Ah. You're here."/pause 200/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "@. There is something I've been meaning to show you."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/speak MarlonFay "It's time you meet Krobus. He's a shadow person I've been hiding in the Pelican Town sewers."/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 600/shake MarlonFay 500/playSound openBox/pause 800/move MarlonFay 0 0 2/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Come. Join me outside."/pause 250/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/changeLocation Town/stopMusic/pause 500/warp farmer 37 101/warp MarlonFay 34 96/viewport 37 97 true/move farmer 0 -5 3/pause 400/speak MarlonFay "Let me unlock this first."/pause 750/playSound openBox/pause 600/playSound doorOpen/pause 100/playSound trashcanlid/pause 800/speak MarlonFay "Alright. Watch your step."/pause 600/playSound stairsdown/pause 600/move farmer -2 0 2/pause 250/playSound stairsdown/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/changeLocation Sewer/playMusic Upper_Ambient/pause 300/warp Krobus 31 20/warp farmer -200 -200/warp MarlonFay 17 11/pause 300/speak MarlonFay "This door leads to a tunnel network that'll take us to Krobus."/pause 500/playSound trashcanlid/playSound trashcanlid/pause 700/speak MarlonFay "Not too far now. Down this ladder."/pause 500/playSound stairsdown/pause 700/warp MarlonFay 17 11/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame MarlonFay 18/move Krobus -10 0 0 true/viewport 19 17 true/pause 2000/playSound stairsdown/warp farmer 16 11/pause 900/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 900/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/move MarlonFay 0 0 2/move MarlonFay 0 0 2/pause 400/move MarlonFay 0 6 2 true/pause 300/move farmer 0 5 2 true/pause 2000/speak MarlonFay "Krobus. I have someone here I'd like you to meet."/pause 500/shake Krobus 800/emote Krobus 28 true/pause 1300/move Krobus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Krobus "..."/pause 700/speed Krobus 2/move Krobus -4 0 0/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Krobus, meet @, our newest guild member."/pause 750/speak Krobus "P-pleasure to m-meet you..."/pause 700/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/speak Krobus "We've met before. B-but I ran away from you...#$b#I run away from most humans..."/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Krobus has... had bad experiences with humans. I stumbled into him during a mission many years ago.#$b#Unlike other shadow people, Krobus speaks our language and is friendly. It's... unprecedented."/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Adventurers often stab first and ask questions later. Shielding him from them was imperative.#$b#Magnus and I arranged him a temporary home in the sewers."/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 200/move MarlonFay 0 0 2/pause 400/speak Krobus "I'm grateful to them. They treat me nicely... like I'm a person.$1"/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 400/speak MarlonFay "@, if anyone in town saw Krobus, they could notify the Order. He would be taken away.#$b#You must keep what you've seen here secret."/pause 150/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Let us return to the Guild. I have something to give you."/pause 600/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "We'll be taking our leave, Krobus. It's been a pleasure, as always.#$b#You'll be seeing @ again soon."/pause 500/speak Krobus "..."/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/playSound stairsdown/pause 1000/playSound stairsdown/pause 200/changeLocation AdventureGuild/pause 100/playMusic MarlonsTheme/warp farmer 7 5/warp Krobus -300 -300/warp MarlonFay 9 5/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 100/move MarlonFay 0 0 3/viewport 7 5 true/pause 1500/speak MarlonFay "You've proven your trust to me.#$b#Here is a key to the sewers. Until now, only Magnus, Gil, and I had a copy. Now you do too."/pause 500/playSound reward/message "You received a key to the sewers!"/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "You should speak to Krobus. He seems fond of you.#$b#And don't forget, he is to remain a secret."/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/friendship Krobus 125/end position 4 13

Entries.0002577/w rainy/y 2/b 1/f MarlonFay 2000: continue/15 20/MarlonFay 21 25 0/skippable/pause 3000/speak MarlonFay "...$2#$b#I'm sorry I have not visited lately. My bad leg is... proving troublesome.$2#$b#The hikes to the summit are becoming more difficult. My age is starting to show.$2"/pause 2200/speak MarlonFay "I was reminiscing of the old group with Gil...$2#$b#Jonathan, Boris, Alesia, Barin, Ketra, Gerta...$2#$b#My guilty pleasure of recalling the past - back when you were still..."/pause 800/shake MarlonFay 1000/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "I had the nightmare again, Isabelle...$2#$b#...$2#$b#The moment I lost you...$2"/pause 2000/speak MarlonFay "...Soon, I'll be with you again. But there is work to do before that time comes.$2#$b#Until next time, my flower.$2"/pause 1500/faceDirection MarlonFay 3 true/pause 800/speed MarlonFay 2/move MarlonFay -7 0 3 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/end dialogue MarlonFay "...$2#$e#...$0#$e#Hmm?$0#$b#I was... recalling past events.$2#$e#%Marlon turns away from you."

Entries.690006/n slimeHutchBuilt/H: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 MarlonFay 66 15 0/broadcastEvent/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "Bumped into Robin this morning... she told me you've got a new Slime Hutch!$1#$b#I was into slime breeding at your age. It's a great hobby... but dangerous.$1#$b#How'd you think I lost this eye?$2"/shake MarlonFay 1000/showFrame MarlonFay 16/textAboveHead MarlonFay "Hah!"/pause 1000/textAboveHead MarlonFay "Just Kidding."/showFrame MarlonFay 17/pause 700/showFrame MarlonFay 8/pause 800/speak MarlonFay "Here, I've got something for you."/itemAboveHead slimeEgg/pause 1000/pause 1000/pause 1300/awardFestivalPrize slimeEgg/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "It's a slime egg. You can place that inside a slime incubator to hatch it.#$b#Now, take a good hard look at that egg. Next time you're out slime-hunting keep your eyes peeled for more eggs. They're rare, but slimes do drop them from time to time.#$b#Collect eggs from different slimes to add some variety to your herd!"/pause 500/end

Entries.100162/t 600 2600: MarlonsTheme/21 9/farmer -100 -100 0 MarlonFay 23 6 2/addQuest 14/skippable/pause 1000/move MarlonFay 0 2 2/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 19/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "Hmmm... "/pause 500/warp farmer 18 13/playSound stoneStep/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 5 0 0/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "...I was just wondering how far down this mine shaft goes.#$b#I'm going to take care of some of the monsters in here before they start climbing out into the valley.$0"/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 2000/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "I've met a lot of adventurers in my time. I recognize that look in your eye.$1#$b#Old age hasn't robbed me of my eyesight, or my skill with a sword, quite yet.$2"/pause 1500/speak MarlonFay "Take this weapon. It may not look like much, but it's imbued with magic. With it, you'll be able to battle the monsters here."/playSound dwop/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 2/itemAboveHead sword/pause 3300/awardFestivalPrize sword/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "I'll keep my eye on you. Prove yourself and I might think about making you a member."/pause 750/end

Entries.1337098: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer -200 -200 0 MarlonFay 4 11 2/viewport 6 13 true/skippable/pause 2000/warp farmer 6 19/playSound doorClose/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 17/pause 150/textAboveHead MarlonFay "You found something!"/pause 350/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "That weapon! I felt the power of the cosmos for a brief second.#$b#Wizards and scholars believe Yoba gifts these weapons to true peacekeepers of humanity."/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "I will allow you to purchase galaxy weapons from our hidden weapons cache, adventurer.$0#$b#I'm proud of you!$1"/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 500/playSound reward/message "I can now purchase galaxy weapons from Marlon!"/pause 500/end

Entries.Introduction: Um... Greetings! My name is Morgan. I'm a pupil of the Harvest Goddess. What's your name?$0#$e#It's been a pleasure!$1
Entries.spring_12: The Harvest Goddess and I are traveling deep into the forest tomorrow.$1#$b#I won't be attending the town festival.$0#$e#She found a place with a really high concentration of raw magic. I'm excited!$3
Entries.Mon4: The Harvest Goddess is teaching me about the magical properties of mystical ancient plants.$3#$e#She tells me the valley used to be full of them a long time ago.$1
Entries.Tue2: I have an exam soon. I'm ready to pass it!$1#$e#I want to protect people.$1
Entries.Thu: Do you like my hat?$1#$e#The Harvest Goddess made it for me!$3
Entries.Thu2: The Harvest Goddess told me there's forest sprites deep in the woods.$1#$b#Their magical powers are intertwined with the valley.$3
Entries.Sun4: The Harvest Goddess is showing me a place called 'Sprite Spring'. She's gonna introduce me her forest sprite friends.$1#$e#One of them goes by 'Claus'. He gave her the ancient seeds for her arcane studies.$1
Entries.summer_Mon: I'm going on a special quest to gather something called 'fiddlehead' in the forest.$1#$b#The Harvest Goddess needs it for a potion.$3
Entries.summer_Tue: Sometimes I ask the Harvest Goddess if Vincent or Jas can come visit.$1
Entries.summer_Wed8: I'm going on a field trip tomorrow!$3#$e#I asked if you could come but the Harvest Goddess said no.$0
Entries.summer_Thu: *yawn*...$3#$b#I didn't sleep much last night.$0#$e#Why? I was practicing magic!$1#$e#Don't tell the Harvest Goddess!$5
Entries.fall_15: Welwick is running her clairvoyance booth tomorrow.$1#$e#The Harvest Goddess says she's really powerful.$0
Entries.fall_Mon: Did you know someone names Magnus Rasmodius built the tower on a 'magical field'?$0#$e#I wonder who he is...$3
Entries.fall_Fri: The Harvest Goddess is teaching me the 'Merlin Doctrine'. It's like a big rulebook for mages.$0#$e#It's reeeeeally boring.$2
Entries.fall_Sat6: There's a blocked warp with the sign scratched off in the warp hall. I wonder what it was?$0#$b#The Harvest Goddess forbids me from asking about it. But She'll tell me someday.$4
Entries.fall_Sun: I want to try fire magic but I'm not allowed to.$8#$e#The Harvest Goddess says it's very hard to control.$0
Entries.winter_7: The area where the ice fishing festival takes place has a great mana pool too.$1#$e#Um.The Harvest Goddess and I will be nearby. Try to find us!$1
Entries.winter_Tue: Since it's freezing outside, I'm gonna convince the Harvest Goddess to let me try fire magic.$1#$e#Hmm, you're right. I guess it could be dangerous.$2
Entries.winter_Thu: I've asked the Harvest Goddess about adopting an animal from Marnie's. She said 'maybe'!$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me to the movies, @!$1

AfterMovie.Text: It was a magical film! Thank you, @.$1#$e#Maybe I'll try creating the 'Brave Little Sappling' myself with magic some day!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: A horror film? Okay...$8

AfterMovie.Text: That was scary...$2

BeforeMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me, @.$1

AfterMovie.Text: *yawn* that was kinda boring.$0#$e#Oh! Um. I enjoyed the movie!$3#$e#...$3

BeforeMovie.Text: People are staring at my hat.$8

AfterMovie.Text: I was on the edge of my seat there at the end!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: People are staring at my hat.$8

AfterMovie.Text: That was a good movie! I can't wait to tell Magnus about it!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Can we play the 'crane game'?$1#$e#I could use a little magic to 'sweeten the odds'.$7

AfterMovie.Text: Thank you for the invite, @!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Can we play the 'crane game'?$1

AfterMovie.Text: Um. Thanks, @.$0

I have news from the Ferngill Republic Ministry of Magic.$0#$b#They've assigned me a pupil to train in the elementals. Their name is Morgan."/pause 800/speak Wizard "There was already someone in the valley I would have taught magic to...#$b#But the ministry has spoken. I must do as they command.$0"/pause 700/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "Morgan arrives tomorrow.$0#$b#That is all.$0"/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 600/screenFlash 2/warp Wizard -100 -100/playSound wand/pause 700/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/message "Someone new is arriving in the valley tomorrow!"/pause 1000/end dialogue "Morgan's family made the request to visit once a season, but I denied it.#$e#Allow me to explain.#$b#Mages take an oath to follow the 'Merlin Doctrine'.#$b#The Ministry of Magic has the final say in all things.#$e#Now, I must prepare their reading material."
